item.title: Why Paddington In Peru's Reviews Are Much More Divided Than Paddington 2
item.description: When compared to Paddington 2, which has been argued to be one of the best moves of all time, the reviews for Paddington in Peru are more divided.

item.title: Sign Up For ScreenRant's Exclusive Box Office Newsletter
item.description: The ScreenRant box office newsletter is moving to its own feed, and here's how to make sure it comes into your email inbox every weekend.

item.title: Smile 2's Wild Skye Riley Twist Ending Makes Smile 3 So More Difficult To Pull Off
item.description: Smile 2 has an explosive ending that massively impacts the world of the franchise, but it also makes Smile 3's story so much more difficult.
